name: Click
description:
This is a mouse based puzzle game created over a weekend as a mini-gamejam with coworkers. Theme was "Mouse controls only".

Use left click to navigate your 2 characters through the obstacles and get them both to the finish to move on to the next level.

Currently only 8 levels available.

Controls:

  1. Left Click - Move player(s)
  2. Right click - Switch player's positions
